column1: L, Fox News Host Pete Hegseth Freaks Out Over Rapper's 'Satan Shoes', David, 2021-03-29,
column2: Fox News meteorologist Adam Klotz was forced to correct one of the network's co-hosts on Sunday over misinformation about so-called "Satan shoes" being promoted by rapper Lil Nas X.
column3: During the Fox News morning program Fox & Friends co-host Jedediah Bila reported that Lil Nas X is promoting the shoes which feature a drop of human blood.
column4: You know who makes them? Nike! co-host Pete Hegseth complained erroneously. "Nike! That's a Nike shoe with the sign of Satan on the top called 'Satan shoes.'"
column5: Get out of here! co-host Will Cain exclaimed. "There's got to be more to this."
column6: I saw it before the show Hegseth insisted. "So you can't have the Betsy Ross flag but you can have Nike-made Satan shoes. It's a real thing."
column7: I feel like I'm missing a piece of information Cain complained.
column8: You're not! Hegseth stated. "Look it up. When up is down and down is up. And that's exactly where we are in this culture."
column9: Bila then asked Klotz about the shoes before allowing him to talk about the weather.
column10: Adam would you buy those shoes? she wondered.
column11: I was going to dodge this Klotz said. "They're not really Nike. They're Nike shoes but there's a middle man who bought Nike shoes and is turning them into these."
column13: But Nike could sue them if they really wanted Hegseth stated.
column15: So there's your Nike shoe news that I'm able to do Klotz joked. "And also I can do the weather."
column16: A spokesperson for Nike told Snopes last week that the company was not involved in the creation or marketing of the "Satan shoes."
